snippet: Former President George Bush has praised his successor's speechmaking ability but differs with his stances on revamping health care.   In a speech on Saturday to the California Grocers Association, Mr. Bush said he came away impressed with Preside...
lead_paragraph: Former President George Bush has praised his successor's speechmaking ability but differs with his stances on revamping health care. In a speech on Saturday to the California Grocers Association, Mr. Bush said he came away impressed with President Clinton's nationally televised address on health care.
